mdRecord.dcterms:title: 1983 Season
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Poster for the 1983 Season at the Barter Theatre. Programs: Mousetrap by Agatha Christie, April 29- May 11 | Bus Stop by William Inge, June 8-26 | Fallen Angels by Noel Coward, June 29- July 17 | "DA" by Hugh Leonard, July 20- Aug 7 | Dining Room by A. R. Gurney, Jr., Aug 10-28 | Dial "M" for Murder by Frederick Knott, Aug 31- Sep 8 | to be announced: comedy or musical, Sep 21- Oct 16.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia

This digital surrogate is made publicly available by the Barter Theatre for use in research, teaching, private study, and other educational purposes. Responsibility for any use of these materials rests exclusively with the user. When using this item, users should give proper credit to the owner of the original object as well as to Virginia Tech Libraries.
